hanzi-su-wiki:
堅

Значения

Твёрдый, крепкий, прочный

Мнемоника

Земля 土, которой путём трамбовки нужно придать контролируемую, т.е. нужную твёрдость. Чиновник 臣 руководит 又 процессом трамбовки.

Варианты

坚
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiān
strong; solid; firm; unyielding; resolute
сильный; твердый; твердый; непреклонный; решительный

坚坚		hard, strong, firm, resolute
  • hard, eye and hand 臤 controlling ground 土: firm and resolute
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 坚)
Ideographic: A stern 臤 fortification 土; 臤 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
堅持 [ jiān chí ]: to persevere with; to persist in; to insist on
堅決 [ jiān jué ]: firm; resolute; determined
堅定 [ jiān dìng ]: firm; steady; staunch; resolute
堅強 [ jiān qiáng ]: staunch; strong
堅實 [ jiān shí ]: firm and substantial; solid
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 臤 [ qiān ] stern; wise
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
heisig_chinese_memo: The firm parent thinks adolescent kids are "slaves to their crotch" (= can't control their hormones), so he grounds them. Permanently!
heisig_constituent: strict, loincloth, retainer, slave, crotch, soil, dirt, ground
Keyword_KANJIDIC: strict, hard, solid, tough, tight, reliable
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: строгий, жесткий, твердый, жесткий, плотный, надежный
koohiiStory1: The strict parent thinks adolescent kids are "slaves to their crotch" (= can´t control their hormones), so he grounds them. Permanently!
koohiiStory2: I´m very strict about not just sleeping with anyone. People who are slaves to their crotches often end up with dirty genitalia and I don´t want to get their VD. (on yomi=ケン).
jp_example_words: 堅い(かたい): hard (especially wood), steadfast, honorable, stuffy writing
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A servant secures a stool in the dirt so that it is a solid sitting device. If you just throw a stool on the ground it will flop over easily. But if you have a servant to dig it into the dirt a bit, it becomes nice and solid and safe for sitting!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture two stools in your mind. One is solid, you want to sit on it. The other looks like the wind will knock it over. Don't sit on that!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need this stool to be extra solid because you're using it to test your new catapult (かた). If it isn't solid, when you launch it and yourself in the catapult, the stool might fall over, killing you both. And you don't want that, now do you?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You better hope that catapult is solid too. If it isn't the whole thing will come apart when you try to launch yourself into the air.
Ru_Meaning: strict, hard, solid, tough, tight, reliable
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 堅い (かたい、ケン), 硬い (かたい、コウ), 固い (かたい、コ)
Ru_trainchinese:
jiān: (графема) сильный, твердый
jiān: (графема) решительный, крепкий, прочный, солидный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hard (臤) ground (土) is tough
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The evil prosecuter's plan was foiled again by a young defense lawyer with a firm grounding in law from Harvard.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "臤", from " earth ", the original meaning is hard. "Shuowen": "Gang Ye. From the earth." "Yi·Kun": "Let the frost and the ice reach."

" Strong " can mean firmness. "Mencius·Lianghui King": "It can make the Qin Chu strong and powerful."

" Jian " also refers to the firm hard thing. "Historical Records-Xiang Yu Benji": "A husband is firm and sharp, righteousness is not as good as public; sitting and acting, justice is not as good as justice."

" Jian " also means fulfillment. "Poetry·Daya·Shengmin": "It is real and beautiful, and it is solid and good." Kong Yingda Shu: "Its grains are solid and solid, and they are solid and good."

" Jian " also said that a strong, strong. "Poetry‧ Daya‧ Xingwei": "Dun bow is strong, and Wu is both Jun." Zhu Xi's collection: "Strong, strong."
humanum_short_description_en: From "臤", from " earth ", the original meaning is hard.
humanum_full_description:
從「臤」，從「土」，本義為堅硬。《說文》：「剛也。从臤从土。」 《易‧坤》：「履霜堅冰至。」

　　「堅」可表示牢固。《孟子‧梁惠王上》：「可使製梃以撻秦楚之堅甲利兵矣。」

　　「堅」也指牢固堅硬之物。《史記‧項羽本紀》：「夫被堅執銳，義不如公；坐而運策，公不如義。」

　　「堅」還表示充實。《詩‧大雅‧生民》：「實發實秀，實堅實好。」孔穎達疏：「其粒實皆堅成，實又齊好。」

　　「堅」亦表示強勁、堅強。《詩‧大雅‧行葦》：「敦弓既堅，鍭既鈞。」朱熹集傳：「堅，猶勁也。」

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A stern 臤 fortification 土; 臤 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 臤 [ qiān ] stern; wise
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
①牢固，結實，硬：堅固。堅實。堅如磐石。
②不動搖，不改變：堅決。堅信。
③牢固、結實的東西或陣地：中堅。攻堅。披堅執銳。
④姓氏。

堅い(かたい): hard (especially wood), steadfast, honorable, stuffy writing

從「 臤 」，從「 土 」，本義為堅硬。《說文》：「剛也。从臤从土。」 《易‧坤》：「履霜堅冰至。」 「 堅 」可表示牢固。《孟子‧梁惠王上》：「可使製梃以撻秦楚之堅甲利兵矣。」 「 堅 」也指牢固堅硬之物。《史記‧項羽本紀》：「夫被堅執銳，義不如公；坐而運策，公不如義。」 「 堅 」還表示充實。《詩‧大雅‧生民》：「實發實秀，實堅實好。」孔穎達疏：「其粒實皆堅成，實又齊好。」 「 堅 」亦表示強勁、堅強。《詩‧大雅‧行葦》：「敦弓既堅，鍭既鈞。」朱熹集傳：「堅，猶勁也。」
From " 臤", from " earth", the original meaning is hard. "Shuowen": "Gang Ye. From the earth." "Yi·Kun": "Let the frost and the ice reach." " Strong" can mean firmness. "Mencius·Lianghui King": "It can make the Qin Chu strong and powerful." " Jian" also refers to the firm hard thing. "Historical Records-Xiang Yu Benji": "A husband is firm and sharp, righteousness is not as good as public; sitting and acting, justice is not as good as justice." " Jian" also means fulfillment. "Poetry·Daya·Shengmin": "It is real and beautiful, and it is solid and good." Kong Yingda Shu: "Its grains are solid and solid, and they are solid and good." " Jian" also said that a strong, strong. "Poetry‧ Daya‧ Xingwei": "Dun bow is strong, and Wu is both Jun." Zhu Xi's collection: "Strong, strong."

jiān
вм. 坚
Radicals: 臣, 又, 土  (servant, stool, dirt)
Meaning Mnemonic
A servant secures a stool in the dirt so that it is a solid sitting device. If you just throw a stool on the ground it will flop over easily. But if you have a servant to dig it into the dirt a bit, it becomes nice and solid and safe for sitting!
Picture two stools in your mind. One is solid, you want to sit on it. The other looks like the wind will knock it over. Don't sit on that!
Reading Mnemonic
You need this stool to be extra solid because you're using it to test your new catapult (かた). If it isn't solid, when you launch it and yourself in the catapult, the stool might fall over, killing you both. And you don't want that, now do you?
You better hope that catapult is solid too. If it isn't the whole thing will come apart when you try to launch yourself into the air.
